name: Sample checklist for validating styles
description: This is just a sample checklist - be sure to delete it

checks.name: style is identifiable
checks.guide: Open the style file with an external text editor then look for the qgis/flags/Identifiable element. Check that its text equals '1'.

checks.name: uses the SOVEREIGNT attribute to render symbology
checks.description: The style document uses the QGIS QML style format
checks.guide: Open the style file with an external text editor and then look to the qgis/renderer-v2 element. Check that its 'attr' attribute equals 'SOVEREIGNT'
